meta.content: Located in Daybreak in South Jordan, Utah, American Academy of Innovation (AAI) provides students in grades 6 through 12 a project-based education.

div.h1: AAI RESPONSE TO COVID-19: Stay Up To Date

p.span: Online Classes held March 18 to May 1
Maintaining high standards of educational quality
Featuring courses in Animal Science & Engineering|Robotics
Doing more together than we can do apart
Offering courses for college credit at Salt Lake Community College and Mountainland Technical College
DECA, FIRST® Robotics, GSA, Jam Band, Ultimate Spikeball and many more
Fresh, housemade lunch program prepared under the direction of a professional chef
Located right next to TRAX in the heart of Daybreak

p.br:
5410 W. South Jordan Parkway
South Jordan, UT 84009

div.p: All Grades: M-Th: 8:30 am to 3:30 pm
